Notes: A large flower enemy that attacks the player by crushing them with its large head. It can be defeated by smashing a Stretch Plant or coconut into it. Furthermore, the player can jump on its head to defeat it, however, this does not work for the spiky variant. The player can also use most of their attacks to defeat it. It can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Doesn't Drop Items?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it won't drop any Star Bits when defeated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 100 points in The Chimp's challenges.
